mapper.select: SELECT replyID, replyContent, replyGno, replyOno, replyNested, replyPostDate, memberID, commID, (SELECT memberName FROM Members WHERE memberID = r.memberID) AS memberName FROM Reply r WHERE commID = #{commID} ORDER BY replyGno ASC, replyOno ASC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO Reply (replyContent, replyGno, replyOno, replyNested, replyPostDate, memberID, commID) VALUES (#{replyContent}, #{replyGno}, 0, 0, DATE_ADD(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INTERVAL 9 HOUR), #{memberID}, #{commID})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

INSERT INTO Reply (replyContent, replyGno, replyOno, replyNested, replyPostDate, memberID, commID) VALUES (#{replyContent}, #{replyGno}, #{replyOno}, #{replyNested}+1, DATE_ADD(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INTERVAL 9 HOUR), #{memberID}, #{commID})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: select replyID, replyContent, replyGno, replyOno, replyNested, replyPostDate, memberID, commID from Reply where commID = #{commID} AND replyGno = #{replyGno} AND replyOno > #{replyOno} AND replyNested <= #{replyNested} order by replyOno limit 0 , 1
